 This method should return the number of non RELIABLE_DRIVER messages that the primer writes to the bundle.

Detailed Description

This class defines an interface for objects used for priming bundles on channels with data.

It is used by ServerConnection and Proxy to write the 'authenticate' message to the start of each bundle.

See also:
Channel::bundlePrimer
